'''Googol Chair''' is an event-exclusive [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It can be obtained by claiming Surprise Bundle 2, 3 or 4 from the [[Google Play Gift Card Collab-Event]]. Max amount obtainable is 5.
